name: Flappy Monsta
description:
This game is created by Rick_IkkI.

This game is created for https://monstainfinite.com/ communty .

The object of the game is to deliver gifts to the house, and not drop the gifts to the ground.

Pay attention to the candle.

Control

Left Clic for jump.

Space bar for deliver gifts.

This Game is a fan game , so it is not and official mini game .

Merry Christmas Everybody.

Rick_IkkI.
